Articles.Content:
Hello,

I would like to point out that the Patcher that is downloaded via the Launcher is a .exe file, which is completely useless on a Mac. I tried launching it with Wine, but nothing happened, so I guess I have to update manually by downloading the newest version.

Is this a bug? Should this be happening? I have no idea. All I know is, the launcher won't let me click "update" (even though 1.0.4 is out and I'm still on 1.0.2), and the Patcher that was downloaded was a .exe file, which I cannot use.

Anyone having this same issue? any solutions? Please help!
The launcher will not update KSP, this is a known issue, see here for help.
